results.content: Just what I was looking for

Extremely useful course! 
I learned a lot, also helped me to learn, how I can develop my knowledge further on my own, as that is crucial thing, as no course is going to teach you everything, therefore learning how to explore, extends course beyond itself.
Take this course, if you are on the fence, thinking, whether to take it or not :)

results.content:
I have posted this in the feedback forum as well: 

The instructor does a great job of explaining how to use all the tools in order to aid our efforts in using jQuery UI! I watched the setting the stage videos and after this section, I understood what tools will be needed to begin using jQuery UI. Ayad Boudiab goes into great detail to ensure that I know all my options and I understand the capabilities of each tool. Also, I can hear him clearly. A minor suggestion: At the end of the video possibly provide a quick visual summary of what was taught in the video. Just a quick wrap up will help, because especially with longer videos, it is easy to forget what was learned when there is so much at once. One example would be to have 1 powerpoint slide that has a few bullets of summary at the end of each video. This will help me tremendously in maintaining a sense of structure and help me to understand the overall idea quickly.

results.content:
This course is superb for beginners as well as experienced developers.Ayad has taken a lot of effort to go to the depth of explaining the core concept with a example after every topic.
Guys this is an opportunity to dive into JQuery and have a very clear understanding.
People who are having a thought of going for this course,don't miss the chance.

Ayad your course is very informative,please could you kindly make courses on these Technologies XML, JSON, AJAX, REST and SOAP since you have provided a in depth information on jQuery UI In Depth.

results.content:
good for all developer experience levels.  explains the basics of jquery (including setup), all the way down to the low level details.

very in depth course.  highly recommended for those learning jquery.
